title: 10/24 [RESOLVED] RP Purchases Unvailable
body:
>Update 4:40PM
>
>Still noticing some problems with the server after the restart, so we're going to take it offline for now and will use secondary servers.  RP purchases are back online and we'll continue to monitor for any additional problems. 
> 
>Thanks everyone!

----

>Update 4:10PM
>
>Looks like a server in the backend started acting up so we're currently working on restarting and ensuring it functions properly.

----

Hey everyone,

Starting ~3:25 PM RP Purchases became unavailable.  We're in the early stages of investigating so don't have many details as of yet, but we'll update this thread with more information as we get it.

replies.body:
I just bought two 10 dolor Card and i cant redeem 
i got two question 
1st is when is the purchases will open and 2nd is will my card get expired
